title: Account issues，please help.
body:
Riot I haven't been able to get in my  account JieyingBB, I have not changed my password.

request (#30043009) ，But I can not view the progress.   How long do I need to wait ？

replies.body: No worries! I saw your ticket in the queues and we'll be able to help as soon as our specialists can get to yours. I also noticed that you had submitted the ticket yesterday then replied back today, which would have pushed your ticket back in line a bit. Sit tight, and you should be getting a response relatively soon!
